reviewText:
I gave it as a gift. My friend said he is grateful. He was a dedicated circus fan, but who is
angry with the hatchet faces who condemned elephants in circuses, who equate animals
with humans. Would I be wise to ask the hatchet faces if it's okay if I kill termites that
are chewing my window sill? Should I protest against Ortho for their reckless disregard for bug life?
I'm in a quandary; a nervous wreck in need of therapy.
Wish it was more of the actual circus performance and less interviews. Folks found it boring and we ended up turning it off.

Not only was the product in great shape; but it also arrived within 5 days of the order.  There are web site links on the package to learn more about the status of Barnum & Bailey's as well as more circus video clips.
